TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_sumamadan, title = sumamadan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/sumamadan} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:古時候) manamuh kaku a mitengil tu nu sumamad a kungku. .
(kamo no holam:古時候) manamoh kako a mitengil to no somamad a kongko. .
